hooks.command: cmd=$(jq -r '.tool_input.command'); echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] Checking command: $cmd" >> .claude/logs/hooks.log; if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE '(rm\s+-rf\s+/|rm\s+-rf\s+\*|cat\s+\.env)'; then echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] BLOCKED: Dangerous command detected: $cmd" >> .claude/logs/hooks.log; echo "ERROR: Dangerous command blocked - This operation could cause irreversible damage." >&2; exit 1; fi
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] ESLint: $file_path" >> .claude/logs/hooks.log; pnpm eslint --fix "$file_path" 2>&1 >> .claude/logs/hooks.log; }

jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] Prettier: $file_path" >> .claude/logs/hooks.log; pnpm prettier --write "$file_path" 2>&1 >> .claude/logs/hooks.log; }
